definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: And a U.N. peacekeeping force called for in the Djibouti accord has yet to be formed.
sentences.chinese: 吉布提协议中要求部署的联合国维和部队还没有组成。

sentences.english: China was among the first countries sending peace-keepers to Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 中国是首批向这一地区派遣维和部队的国家之一。

sentences.english: China's peace-keepers have joined United Nations peace-keeping operations.
sentences.chinese: 中国派出了维和人员参与联合国的维和行动。

sentences.english: China's peace-keepers have joined United Nations peace-keeping operations.
sentences.chinese: 中国派出了维和人员参与联合国的维和行动。

sentences.english: Mr. Ramos-Horta says that international peacekeepers were too slow in their attempts to catch his attackers.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔塔说，国际维和部队追捕袭击者的行动过于缓慢。

sentences.english: PNS:produced by Yunnan Yuxi Wethe Pharmaceutical Factory.
sentences.chinese: 云南玉溪维和制药厂生产。

sentences.english: Model-set design in one-dimensional space and two-dimensional space is also given.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了一维和二维模型集合的具体设计。

sentences.english: Its mandate is due to expire next month, but it is expected to be renewed. 0 M7 V% V.
sentences.chinese: 联合国在那里的维和使命本月到期，但预计会延长。

sentences.english: Du and his other 3 peacekeeping colleagues shall not be bled in vain.
sentences.chinese: 杜照宇和他的三名维和同事的鲜血不能白流。

sentences.english: And peace keepers have completed their training of Timorese police and soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 维和部队已经完成了训练东帝汶警察以及士兵的任务。

sentences.english: This comedy centers around the married couple Harvey and Gillian .
sentences.chinese: 这喜剧中心的已婚夫妇哈维和吉莉安。

sentences.english: A peacekeeper's most effective "weapon" is the support of the international community.
sentences.chinese: 维和人员最有效的“武器”是国际社会的支持。

sentences.english: I would like to elaborate three points on how to further strengthen UN peace-keeping actions.
sentences.chinese: 如何进一步加强联合国维和行动，我想谈三点看法。

sentences.english: The convoy of Chinese peacekeeping transportation detachment are traveling across the vast forest in west Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中国维和运输分队的车队穿越西非茫茫丛林地带。

sentences.english: The peace-preserving army of the United Nations pulled out of the area.
sentences.chinese: 联合国的维和部队撤出了那个地区。

sentences.english: Mr. Toews and other officials have declined to publicly outline the nature of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 涂司维和其他官员拒绝公开透露这次袭击的性质。

definition: to evacuate (e.g. foreign civilians from a war zone)
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
